com.tractrac.model.lib.api.event

Interface ICompetitor

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IAttachable, IIdentifiable, IMetadataContainer, INamed, IPropertiesContainer, com.tractrac.util.lib.api.serialize.ISerializable

    public interface ICompetitor
extends INamed, IMetadataContainer, com.tractrac.util.lib.api.serialize.ISerializable

    Encapsulates data related to a Competitor of an Event.

    A competitor has a unique id and a name. It can be but need not to be linked to a Competitor Class and a Team.

    *

    Custom data may be attached to each ICompetitor instance.

    Version:
    3.0
    Author:
    Jesper Grooss
    See Also:
    ITeam}, ICompetitorClass}
